positions.title: Research Associate - Labour Economics
positions.description: Join our team as a Research Associate focusing on labour economics and organizational behavior studies.
responsibilities: Conduct quantitative research on labour market dynamics
Analyze economic data using statistical software
Assist in preparing research papers and reports
Collaborate with faculty members on ongoing projects
requirements: Master's degree in Economics or related field
Strong background in econometrics and statistical analysis
Proficiency in R, Python, or similar statistical software

positions.title: Postdoctoral Fellow - Behavioral Economics
positions.description: We're seeking a Postdoctoral Fellow to conduct research in behavioral economics and decision-making.
responsibilities: Develop research proposals and secure funding
requirements: PhD in Economics, Psychology, or related field
Experience in experimental design and analysis

positions.title: Data Scientist - Economic Research
positions.description: Looking for a Data Scientist to support our research initiatives in economic behavior and decision-making.
responsibilities: Develop machine learning models for economic analysis
Process and analyze large-scale economic datasets
Create data visualization tools and dashboards
Collaborate with researchers on data-driven projects
requirements: Master's or PhD in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python and R
Experience with machine learning and statistical modeling
